ModMetaData.name: Ground Turret Mod (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Alfie Brook
ModMetaData.description:
Add "burrow" and "unburrow" Command to turrets. Clear all enemy hatred when in the concealed state. Offer a way to protect your turrets and distract enemy's attack route.
给炮塔增加了“隐蔽”和“展开”选项。 隐蔽状态下清空所有敌人仇恨。 提供了一种保护炮塔，分散敌人路径的新方式。
